what: Unifying Multiple Biplot Visualisations into a Single Display
title: Unifying Multiple Biplot Visualisations into a Single Display
text: GPAbin biplots unify visualisations multiple imputed data.

title: Unifying Multiple Biplot Visualisations into a Single Display
text: can install development version GPAbin GitHub :

title: Unifying Multiple Biplot Visualisations into a Single Display
text: Generalised orthogonal Procrustes analysis (GPA) used align individual biplots combining separate coordinate sets average coordinate matrix, mimic Rubin’s rules. Finally, average coordinate matrix utilized construct single biplot called GPAbin biplot.

title: Category level prediction — CLPpred
text: Predicts category levels MCA based biplot using distances coordinates

title: Category level prediction — CLPpred
code: CLPpred(CLPs = CLPs, Zs = Zs, p = p, n = n, lvls = lvls, datIN = datIN)

title: Category level prediction — CLPpred
text: CLPs Category level point coordinates Zs Sample coordinates p Number variables n Number samples lvls Names category levels datIN Input data CLPs Zs obtained

title: Category level prediction — CLPpred
text: predCL Final predicted categorical data set

title: Dimension reduction — DRT
text: Multiple correspondence analysis performed multiple imputed datasets

title: Dimension reduction — DRT
text: missbp object class missbp obtained preceding function missmi() method Select dimension reduction technique. current version MCA available.

title: Dimension reduction — DRT
text: missbp object appended following objects: Z List sample coordinates CLP List category level point coordinates lvls List category level names m Number multiple imputations See also missmi impute.

title: Generalised Orthogonal Procrustes Analysis — GPA
text: function contains OPA function compare two configurations GPA function multiple configuration comparisons

title: Generalised Orthogonal Procrustes Analysis — GPA
text: Xk list containing testee configurations updated #iteration G.target Target configuration. specified centroid configuration used target iter Number iterations allowed convergence eps Threshold value convergence alogrithm

title: Generalised Orthogonal Procrustes Analysis — GPA
text: Xk.F List containing updated testee configurations sk.F Vector containing final scaling factors Qk.F List containing final rotation matrices Gmat Final target configuration sum.sq Final minimised sum squared distance

what: Function to unify coordinates of multiple configurations — GPAbin
title: Function to unify coordinates of multiple configurations — GPAbin
text: Combines multiple configurations dimension reduction solutions applied multiple imputed data sets

title: Function to unify coordinates of multiple configurations — GPAbin
Function to unify coordinates of multiple configurations — GPAbin
text: missbp object class missmi obtained preceding function missmi() G.target Target configuration. specified centroid configuration used target.

title: Function to unify coordinates of multiple configurations — GPAbin
text: missbp object appended following objects: Z.GPA.list List containing sample coordinates MI GPA CLP.GPA.list List containing CLPs MI GPA G.target Target configuration Z.GPAbin Sample coordinates GPAbin biplot CLP.GPAbin CLPs GPAbin biplot See also missmi, impute DRT. detail, refer Nienkemper-Swanepoel, J., le Roux, N. J., & Gardner-Lubbe, S. (2021). GPAbin: unifying visualizations multiple imputations missing values. Communications Statistics - Simulation Computation, 52(6), 2666–2685. https://doi.org/10.1080/03610918.2021.1914089.

title: Function to unify coordinates of multiple configurations — GPAbin
Orthogonal Procrustes Analysis — OPA
text: function performs Orthogonal Procrustes Analysis centred data

title: Orthogonal Procrustes Analysis — OPA
text: missbp object class missmi obtained preceding function missmi() compdat Complete data set, available simulated data examples. centring Logical argument apply centering, default TRUE. dim Number dimensions use final solutions (2D available dimensions.)

title: Orthogonal Procrustes Analysis — OPA
text: ProcStat Procrustes Statistic compZ Sample coordinates representing complete data set compCLP Category level point coordinates representing complete data set complvls Category levels compdat Complete data set, available simulated data examples

title: Biplot function — biplFig
text: Creates multiple correspondence analysis (MCA) biplot

title: Biplot function — biplFig
code: biplFig(   missbp,   Z.col = "#61223b",   CLP.col = "#b79962",   Z.pch = 19,   CLP.pch = 15,   Z.cex = 1.5,   CLP.cex = 1.7,   title = "" )

title: Biplot function — biplFig
text: missbp object class missbp obtained preceding function missmi() Z.col Colour sample coordinates CLP.col Colour category level point coordinates Z.pch Plotting character sample coordinates CLP.pch Plotting character category level point coordinates Z.cex Size plotting character sample points CLP.cex Size plotting character category level point points title Title plot

title: Biplot function — biplFig
text: compdat = NULL evalMeas, GPAbin biplot constructed. complete data set (compdat) specified evalMeas, two biplots constructed: (1) Complete MCA biplot (2) GPAbin biplot.

title: Biplot function — biplFig
code: data(implist) missbp <- missmi(implist)|> DRT() |> GPAbin() |> biplFig()

what: Evaluation measures when complete data is available — evalMeas
title: Evaluation measures when complete data is available — evalMeas
text: Calculates measures comparison based distances two configurations two dimensions.

title: Evaluation measures when complete data is available — evalMeas
Evaluation measures when complete data is available — evalMeas
text: missbp object class missbp obtained preceding function missmi(). compdat Complete data matrix representing input data missmi()

title: Evaluation measures when complete data is available — evalMeas
text: missbp object appended following objects: eval Returns data table five evaluation measures: Procrustes Statistic (PS), Similarity Proportion (SP), Response Profile Recovery (RPR), Absolute Mean Bias (AMB), Root Mean Squared Bias (RMSB) GPApred dataframe representing predicted categorical responses GPAbin biplot. compPred dataframe representing predicted categorical responses complete MCA biplot. compZs Sample coordinates MCA biplot complete data. compCLPs CLPs MCA biplot complete data. complvls Names CLPs MCA biplot complete data. See also missmi, impute, DRT GPAbin. detail, refer Nienkemper-Swanepoel, J., le Roux, N. J., & Gardner-Lubbe, S. (2021). GPAbin: unifying visualizations multiple imputations missing values. Communications Statistics - Simulation Computation, 52(6), 2666–2685. https://doi.org/10.1080/03610918.2021.1914089.

title: Evaluation measures when complete data is available — evalMeas
